channel.title: Im not begging this time,but i need help!
channel.description: I am starting a server where i give my pass and user to people on my forum and they see the beta, but when i put a shop in, whenever they try to use it they get "connection lost, waiting to resablish" or something like that! and how do remove a npc? and how to you put it in a specific place? one last thing, is there a way i can chage my outfit? plz help! :( :confused:

item.title: Im not begging this time,but i need help!
item.dc:creator: @Deathspawn Deathspawn
item.description:
@Deathspawn wrote:

i didnt get any of that, but when i logg back in it dosent have anything anymore, its just normal again. how do i save? i dont use my own i.p. because i dont have a router[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 27, 2008, 09:27:14 am[/size][hr]and wats the clinet,java? where can i find that?

Read full topic
item.source: Im not begging this time,but i need help!

item.title: Im not begging this time,but i need help!
item.dc:creator: @CripScape_Jeff CripScape Jeff
item.description:
@CripScape_Jeff wrote:

first u gotta make a shop in shops.cfg then you gotta give it a number like shop 53 then you gotta go to client.java and search for wanneshop then you should see somthign like } else if (NPCID == 461) {
// Magic store owner
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 39; // Magic
store owner shop
this then you gotta add a new 1 just replace the npcid with your npc that u wanna have be the shop person then change the wanneshop number to the number u assgined the shop adn u shouldnt disconnect and to remove npcs you just take them out of autospawn.cfg

Read full topic
item.source: Im not begging this time,but i need help!
